name: @chickendinosaur/url
description: URL parsing method meant to mimic node's 'url' .parse() with less overhead and more performance.

scripts.benchmark: npm run benchmark-query-string-parse && npm run benchmark-parse
scripts.build: npm run clean && cp -rf src/* lib/
scripts.test: npm run build && tap test/**/*.tap.js --reporter spec
scripts.test-parse: npm run build-parse && tap test/parse.tap.js --reporter spec
scripts.test-query-string-parse: npm run build-query-string-parse && tap test/query-string/parse.tap.js --reporter spec
